channel.title: Herald-Tribune (Custom RSS - Broad Article Grab)
channel.description: A personal RSS feed with broader article scraping from heraldtribune.com

item.title: 1 of 2 Florida celebs sent home on 'Dancing with the Stars,' see scores
item.description: The competition on"Dancing with the Stars"is heating up, and it's only episode three.

item.title: 5 best free and fun things to do in Sarasota-Manatee this weekend
item.description: It's a new season in the Sarasota area — the start of fall, and snowbirds beginning to flock back forOctober— and you'll see both reflected in the lineup of events taking place this weekend, including free and outdoor options.

item.title: 10 burning questions at the midway point of the prep football season
item.description: The Florida high school football season has passed its halfway point.

item.title: New tropical disturbances appear, including one near Florida
item.description: AsHurricane Imeldaspeeds away from Bermuda, theNational Hurricane Center is now tracking two new disturbances, including one that could impact Florida.

item.title: What you need to know about latest tropical conditions
item.description: We know your time is valuable. Here is a quick look at what's happening in the tropics to help you stay informed.Want more details?

item.title: How could system off Florida coast affect your plans through weekend?
item.description: Two newtropical disturbanceshave appeared on theNational Hurricane Center's tropical outlook map and one of them is located off South Florida.

item.title: New Florida law targets gift card fraud with harsh…
item.description: Scammers come at you in lots of different ways.

item.title: Vote for the Herald-Tribune Boys Athlete of the Week for…
item.description: Each week The Herald-Tribune staff will select nominees for the Herald-Tribune Boys Athlete of the Week poll sponsored by Central Florida Behavioral Network, Inc. Nominees are derived from scores and stats emailed in by Sarasota and Manatee county coaches during the week tohtincoming@gmail.com. Readers can then vote in the online poll to determine the Boys Athlete of the Week.

item.title: Vote for the Herald-Tribune Girls Athlete of the Week…
item.description: Each week The Herald-Tribune staff will select nominees for the Herald-Tribune Girls Athlete of the Week poll sponsored by Central Florida Behavioral Network, Inc. Nominees are derived from scores and stats emailed in by Sarasota and Manatee county coaches during the week tohtincoming@gmail.com. Readers can then vote in the online poll to determine the Girls Athlete of the Week.

item.title: Sarasota group sets date for community event after…
item.description: In response to the recent painting over of Sarasota’s “Pridewalk”, Project Pride SRQ will host a “compassion at the crosswalk” event on October 4at the former Pride crosswalk sitein downtown Sarasota, which was removed in August. 28.

item.title: How different positions grade, star college player or…
item.description: Recruiting rankings are an inexact science and putting a list of top recruits together can lead to heated arguments.

item.title: 40-year-old Kilwins reopening symbolizes post-hurricane resilienceMark J. Rochester
item.description: Sometimes, the most important news in a coastal town isn't the political wrangling in Tallahassee or thelatest development proposal. Sometimes, the true pulse of a community is found in the simple, familiar pleasures — like the scent of warm, hand-paddled fudge wafting down John Ringling Boulevard.

item.title: High School Football Week 7 Sarasota, Manatee game previews and predictions
item.description: Preview capsules and predictions for high school football games being played by Sarasota and Manatee County teams on Friday, Oct. 3, 2025.

item.title: Vote for Herald-Tribune's Football Midseason Offensive, Defensive Player of the Year
item.description: We have reached the halfway point of the Sarasota-Manatee high school football season. As we head into the second half of the season, we made our picks for thefront runners for Offensive and Defensive Player of the Year.

item.title: Luxury condo tower pitched for downtown Sarasota with pools and park
item.description: A Chicago-baseddeveloperis looking to build a luxury condominium in downtown Sarasota's Rosemary District.
